text:
There is a submitted idea for this:
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Add-Class-option-to-Drag-and-Drop-Sections/idi-p/382555>
For anyone who is currently using one of the jQuery options in the HubSpot settings and wants to <https://developers.HubSpot.com/cms/guides/jquery/upgrade|upgrade to the latest version of jQuery>.
